abstract: Four movie industry directors and producers opened the production company Bullitt, and the chief of HBO will be given the Media Person of the Year award at Cannes.
snippet: Four movie industry directors and producers opened the production company Bullitt, and the chief of HBO will be given the Media Person of the Year award at Cannes.
lead_paragraph: Meredith Brace joined True[X] Media, New York, as director of sales for the Northwest region, opening an office in Seattle for the company and building a sales team there. She had most recently been global media director for custom media and strategic partnerships at Microsoft.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry

abstract: Plus how to back up an iPod Nano.
snippet: Plus how to back up an iPod Nano.
lead_paragraph: Q. My YouTube mobile app has a nice “+” button for adding a video to my playlist of favorites, but I don’t see a similar button on the desktop browser version of YouTube. How do you do it from the computer?

headline.main: Saving Your Favorite Videos on YouTube
headline.print_headline: Saving Your Favorite Videos on YouTube
